name: Puzzle Planets
description:
Premise:

Oh no... On his journey through space, the tiny astronaut has almost run out of fuel. And he seems a little lost... Help him find his way back home! Land on planets, gather all star-fuel tanks, and try to get the shortest path with the least amount of moves for extra stars!

How to play:

  • Tap tiles to rotate them. 
  • Create a path between the rocket and all fuel tanks.
  • Tap the Rocket to collect and launch!

Available for Android devices:

Only available on Google Play right now. Spend a bit of time making a WebGL build, but there were just too many things to change to make it work properly. Sorry for the inconvenience!

History:

A very early version of this game was created during a week-long gamejam in Utrecht. After some twists and turns and a long time, this is a version created as a single developer to learn and to actually publish a project. Things didn't work well enough with a publisher, so it's just an ads-free puzzle game. I hope you enjoy it!

Credits:

  • Developer - Bas Hoogeboom
  • Special thanks - Nick Post, Andrey Obolenskiy, Julia Kivenko
